content.rendered: The center is situated in the heart of Rubengera, near the district, and offers computer training, computer-based programs for youth, and various other computer-related activities, including information searching and reading for young individuals who are interested.

excerpt.rendered: The Center is located in Rubengera sector near the district, where computer workshops are held, teaching young people programs focused on computers and many other things related to computers such as finding and reading information on computers for young people who want to.
